required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Standardized Nutrient Management on Clinical Outcomes of Hematopoientic Stem Cell Transportation Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Standardized Nutrient Management on Clinical Outcomes of Hematopoientic Stem Cell Transportation Patients--a Cross-sectional Study

lead_sponsor.agency: The Third Xiangya Hospital of Central South University

clinical_study.source: The Third Xiangya Hospital of Central South University

brief_summary.textblock: To analysis a standardized stepped nutritional treatment process for patients with hematopoietic stem cell transportation, including nutritional risk screening and assessment, standardized nutritional treatment implementation, therapeutic effect follow-up and monitoring, family nutritional treatment follow-up, etc

detailed_description.textblock: Standardized nutrition therapy for patients with hematopoietic stem cell transportation should follow the principle of sequential treatment of nutrition, which is the preferred scheme with individualized dietary advice or oral nutritional supplement, if their energy intake will not reach 60% of the goal level during the transplanting, then supplementary parenteral nutrition or total parenteral nutrition is needed. The standardized nutrition therapy aims to improve quality of life and long-term survival rate of patients, reduce the complications and social burden of disease.

primary_outcome.description: We collect the body composition and grip strength of every HSCTpatients. Body composition include the muscle and fat contents.They are all measured as kilogram. (kg). Specific nutritional guidelines will be provided based on body composition results

We asked each patient to complete the quality of life scale for every HSCTpatient. There are 32 questions in the scale, and each question has 4-7 options. The higher the score, the heavier it is.We will decide whether to give psychological intervention based on the score.

arm_group.description: all the patients treated with HSCT are with nutrition risk, so they will be all included to accept nutrition therapy.

intervention.intervention_name: dietary advice, oral nutritional supplement, supplementary parenteral nutrition or total parenteral nutrition
intervention.description: All HSCT(hematopoietic stem cell transplantation) patients should be accepted dietary advice or oral nutritional supplement, if their energy intake will not reach 60% of the goal level during the transplanting, then supplementary parenteral nutrition or total parenteral nutrition.

study_pop.textblock: Both female and male patients and between 10 to 79 years old treated with HSCT can be included.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- â€¢ Patients treated with HSCT
Exclusion Criteria:
